resources.string: Rasmdagi hayvoni ismini Ingliz tilida toping!
The game is intended for children. Here, a child can try finding correct name of animals corresponding displayed animal image!
Bu o`yin bolalar uchun. Bu yerda, bola rasmdagi hayvoni ismini topishga harakat qiladi.
Rasmga qarab, bu qaysi mamlakat bayrog`i ekani toping!
